title: Amarok
summaries: The Amarok is a Hardmode yoyo which has a chance to inflict the Frostbite debuff whenever it hits an enemy. It has a reach of 17 tiles, and a spin duration of 15 seconds. The Amarok has a 0.33*1/300 (0.33%) chance to drop from any enemy defeated in a Snow biome. It can also drop in a Corrupted/Crimsoned or Hallowed Snow biome.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.

statistics.Sell: 4 GC
